info.name: leptoChan
info.description:
A simple 4chan header, reduced to board title, banner, and a new, smaller [New Thread] button. Recommended for those already familiar with the site.
prefix: lepto-
small, narrow.
info.additionalInfo:
• removes all mobile elements
  • removes blotter
  • removes global announcement board
  • removes all ads
  • reduces the "start new thread" button
  • removes all <hr>s except those separating threads from one another
